model_answer: The answer is A: [00:00:49 - 00:02:15]. The speaker stands before a screen showing an image of a large satellite dish in a green field during this time segment as he narrates the 2001 Parkes telescope detection and explains how interference from a farmer's car and microwave ovens misled observers.

The correct answer is C: [00:05:27 - 00:05:56]. The speaker refers to the graph in this segment as they discuss the characteristics of fast radio bursts (FRBs), which have durations of just milliseconds and arrive early at higher frequencies and late at lower frequencies, unlike terrestrial interference that occurs simultaneously across all frequencies.
